full_rpkm: read depth normalized by gene length and by sequencing depth of the sample
source_name: name of tissue or developmental stage for the sample
exp_total: read depth times bases covered from this sample for this gene; unnormalized
exp_rpkm: full_rpkm rounded to three significant figures
_db_description: Gene integrates information from a wide range of species. A record may include nomenclature, Reference Sequences (RefSeqs), maps, pathways, variations, phenotypes, and links to genome-, phenotype-, and locus-specific resources worldwide.
_subdb_description: The expression information of the gene in different tissues.
